author: fitz
msg: A few style cleanups, courtesy of cmpilato.
(organize_lock_targets): Formatting tweaks and use apr macros where
possible.  Remove an unnecessary error check.

author: fitz
msg: * STATUS: Add candidate for locking a switched file bugfix and vote

author: fitz
msg: Fix issue #2307 (a locking bug that occurs when locking a switched
file).  The failing test was committed in r14774 but is now passing
(organize_lock_targets): Rework function to operate on the URLs for
each entry instead of slamming the relative path onto the parent
directory and assuming that that will work.
(store_locks_callback): Rename arg PATHS to REL_URL since that's
what it is now.  Grab the actual relative path from
organize_lock_targets and set the urls_to_paths member of the
(lock_switched_files): Tweak status to expect "Out of working copy"
locks on the files that were actually locked.

author: dlr
msg: improved the doc string.  Added an apr_pool_t * parameter, from
typedef'd and renamed structs.  New names are based on previous
names, plus a "_t" at the end.
apr_pool_t * parameter, from which to allocate the sub-pool.
(test1): Improve test case description.  Account for API name
changes.  Check the return value of svn_intl_initialize, and fail
the test if we don't get a return code of APR_SUCCESS.

author: pburba
msg: Fix bug in svn_ebcdic_pvsprintf's handling of "%[WIDTH]s" and "%[WIDTH]c"
(svn_ebcdic_pvsprintf): Insert leading/trailing spaces to pad out fields
when a minimum width is specified.
